group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Haaaah!

group_1.textRight: They're way slower than Magical Girls. @I guess this is all they can do!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:832800:effect_shake][flashEffect:flashWhite1]Gyah!

group_1.textCenter: Great, if we can keep this up, they won't be@hurt too badly!
And with my shield, if I do things just right,@I can neutralize them without harm...
Push in closer...![chara:100400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100400:cheek_0][chara:100400:motion_400][chara:100400:lipSynch_1][flashEffect:flashWhite2]@And then push them back...!

group_1.textLeft: [live2dName:live2d_0:effect_shake]Hey, where'd this weight come from…?!

group_1.textRight: [live2dName:live2d_1:effect_shake]WAAAH!

group_1.textLeft: That all-powerful martial arts technique,@and a strange force that topples soldiers...
Impossible...! Is she also a Battle Shamaness?!@Masatsuna...you codger…
Heiress of Mizuna, lay down your arms!

group_1.textRight: We won't stand down until you stop harming@your own people!

group_1.textLeft: I understand where you're coming from,@but this is necessary...!

group_1.textRight: How?!

group_1.textLeft: We will report to our liege that the Mizuna Clan@has betrayed us!
Not only are you outsiders to our union,
you have disobeyed our liege's will, and have@enacted your own moratorium at that.
Lord Sumiya will not be so kind as to allow you@to retain your title!

group_1.textRight: Our region is ruled by eminent clans, with roots@stemming back to ancient times.
Unlike outsiders such as the Sumiya, we've@shared our hardships and joys with our people!

group_1.textLeft: And all that is precisely why you should not be@turning your blade against me.
I understand you, Princess Tsuyu.

group_1.textRight: Then WHY?!

group_1.textLeft: Though I may be the heir of the Sango Clan,@I am now part of the Sumiya Clan as well.
I am not free like you are.
As servants of the Sumiya Clan,@we must pay tribute.
We told them of our plight and went unheard,@so despite our grief, we must extract this tribute!
But in honor of your ideals and our long-running@friendship, I'll pretend this never happened.
But if you resist, doing away with the Mizuna@Clan will be a simple matter.

group_1.textRight: But...!

group_1.textLeft: Sumiya alone has over thirty thousand soldiers,@while Hokuyo has a mere three thousand.

group_1.textRight: *Gasp*

group_1.textLeft: Spare your people!
Tsuruno, Sana... That's enough, thank you...

group_1.textRight: This wasn't something we could easily stop...

group_1.textLeft: If I keep pressing the matter, we'll bring@misfortune onto the people of Hokuyo...
And if we continue to resist,@we'll be endangered...

group_1.textRight: I guess our only option is to ask @Governor Sumiya to change his mind...

group_1.textLeft: Since the Taito Gang is controlling the Demons,@defeating them may be a more efficient route...

group_1.textRight: Ah... If only you guys could just get along...
...Huh?
Wait, that's it!@Let's make friends with them instead!

group_1.textLeft: Pardon...?

group_1.textRight: We don't like hurting the people@we care about, right?
So if we befriend the Taito Gang,@they might stop using the Demons!

group_1.textLeft: I never considered that.
By luring them out, we can minimize@the damage!

group_1.textRight: What's your plan?

group_1.textLeft: She's totally convinced the Taito Gang is@controlling the Demons.
I thought we could try shortcutting them into@becoming friends and working together.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'd like for us to befriend Chizuru and@figure out what's going on with the famine...
[se:7201_detect_magic][chara:100400:effect_ef_adv_01]A Magical Girl's signature...? Tsuruno...!
Yo. Long time no see, Tsuyu Mizuna.

group_1.textLeft: Chizuru… What are you doing here?
